resourceTemplates.name: waqi-city-feed
resourceTemplates.title: City Feed
resourceTemplates.description: Get real-time air quality data for a specific city or station ID (e.g., beijing, @7397).

resourceTemplates.name: waqi-geo-feed
resourceTemplates.title: Geolocalized Feed (lat/lng)
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve the nearest station and air quality data for given latitude and longitude coordinates.

resourceTemplates.name: waqi-geo-feed-ip
resourceTemplates.title: Geolocalized Feed (IP-based)
resourceTemplates.description: Get the nearest station and air quality information based on user IP geolocation.

resourceTemplates.name: waqi-map-bounds-template
resourceTemplates.title: Map Bounds Query
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve air quality stations within defined latitude and longitude bounds, filtered by network type (all, official, citizen).

resourceTemplates.name: waqi-search-template
resourceTemplates.title: Search Stations
resourceTemplates.description: Search monitoring stations by city, country, or keyword (e.g., bangalore, beijing).
